shared
Class GUIUtils

java.lang.Object
  shared.GUIUtils

public class GUIUtils
extends java.lang.Object

GUIUtils provides configuration information and utility methods for GUI classes.

Parameters:
parent - the JComponent to add the row to
items - the JComponents to add to parent
maxSize - the maximum size of an item in the row
gap - the gap between rows and items in a row
